kv5.6:1.4_0: Nanu pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa atthi ñāṇaṁ, pathavīkasiṇañca sammutisaccamhīti?
kv5.6:1.6_0: Hañci pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa atthi ñāṇaṁ, pathavīkasiṇañca sammutisaccamhi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv5.6:2.6_0: gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ dadantassa atthi ñāṇaṁ, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro ca sammutisaccamhīti?
kv5.6:2.8_0: Hañci gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ dadantassa atthi ñāṇaṁ, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro ca sammutisaccamhi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv5.6:3.3_0: Tena ñāṇena dukkhaṁ parijānāti, samudayaṁ pajahati, nirodhaṁ sacchikaroti, maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
